General.Name: Bank Ochrony Środowiska SA
General.Description: Bank Ochrony Srodowiska S.A. provides various banking products and services in Poland. It operates through Institutional Clients, Retail Clients, Treasury and Investments, and Brokerage Business segments. The company offers current, term, and interbank deposits; deposits from ALM clients; mortgage, cash, and mortgage-backed cash loans; and financial instruments, debt and equity securities, and derivatives. It also purchases and sells securities for the banking and trading books; maintains securities accounts; manages securities portfolios; and provides brokerage, cash settlement, financial leasing, and financial consulting and advisory services, as well as operates wind farm. The company serves corporate and public finance customers, as well as individuals, micro-enterprises, and housing communities. Bank Ochrony Srodowiska S.A. was founded in 1990 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
